posts.post_content:
Looking for some specific HOFers from the 40s and 50s and have some OJs available to trade!  Here's what I'm looking for, though I'd take similar sets, years and players -

1934 Goudey Dizzy Dean 
1948 Bowman Spahn
1948 Bowman Berra
1948 Blue Tint Spahn 
1948 Blue Tint Kiner 
1948 Blue Tint Jackie Robinson 
1948 Blue Tint Jackie Dimaggio 
1950 Bowman Berra 
1951 Bowman Berra 
1951 Topps Berra 
1951 Berk Ross Berra 
1951 Berk Ross Dimaggio 
1952 Berk Ross Dimaggio 
1952 Bowman Berra
1953 Bowman Berra
1953 Topps Campanella
1953 Bowman Campanella 
(2) 1954 Topps Jackie Robinson 
1954 Topps Ted Williams
1954 Dan Dee Potato Chips Rizzuto
1954 Dan Dee Potato Chips Snider 
1954 Wilson Franks Feller
1954 Red Heart Spahn
(1) 1955 Topps Sandy Koufax 
1955 Bowman Hank Aaron 
1957 Topps Ted Williams

OJs available -

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=432920&d=1609088591[/IMG]


Beatin – Trim w/ back damage - TRADED!
Schoeneck – skinned / trim- TRADED!
Buckley – skinned - TRADED!
Hanrahan – missing corner / fading - TRADED!
Hoffman (Denver) – trimmed but nice photo
Welsh (Athletics) – corners clipped but nice photo
Donnelly (Washington) – pinholes but decent photo
Dealy (Washington) – hole, but sharp photo

Thanks guys!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
A few of these have been traded/sold.  Hoffman, Welsh, Donnelly and Dealy still remain...
